attributes.title: gen z periodt pooh 😌✨
attributes.review: okay so i would just like to say that this app is a big no no. so ANYWAYS back to relevant info, generation z is tired of the bs. we hype each other up and i personally learn more on tiktok than at school (yay to america’s amazing school system w no gun control, goals 😩). yes if you take our source of happiness away we will throw a hissy fit. our generation is powerful. our generation WILL make a change. tell me again when america was ever “great”? oh yeah that’s what i thought. we don’t go away without a fight, ever. remember that. xoxo gossip girl. #blm #putmeonfoxnews :)

attributes.title: I wouldn’t
attributes.review: To start off this app is just not it, lemme start with the finger covered in Cheeto dust when you open the app, 👁👄👁 like If u want to succeed with the app I suggest not having the Cheeto just keep him out 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💕✨. Then I think u should just not waste your time cause you won’t get it back and you will spend it liking at this pig of a human that thinks he knows what he is doing.  In general the app is just glitchy and isn’t very useful at all so it is just occupying space in your storage because why would u want to know about a Cheeto 🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING AND DISGRACEFUL
attributes.review: when i tried downloading it, it took about 17 hours to finally finish even with good wifi and everything soon a pop up showed asking if i wanted to join the illuminati 😳😳😳 and of course i said no because that’s a big no no 😾😾😾 big orange peel should know better than that 🤬🤬🤬🤬anyways when i finally got passed that it was glitch after glitch and soon it brainwashed my dog into packing its bags and leaving the house 😭😭😭😭😭i’m crying so much right now he’s never to be seen again😖😖😖 0/10 do not recommend😾😾😾😾

attributes.title: Wow, racist much?🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫
attributes.review: First off, this app is telling me to add my phone number? yeah, no way in hell. Out of all apps this is definitely not one I will be giving my information to! and 2nd when I opened the app I greeted with a very racist white fat man, me being part of a race that doesn’t happen to have white privilege, I took this to GREAT offense! And when I downloaded this app I was expecting great trømp2020 content BUT that’s CLEARLY not that’s this app is about. Also, I was not warned about seeing a Cheeto in the front page. Which I will admit. Was hilarious!🚫🚫⚠️🤢🤢🤮🤕😪👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: I was interested to see what this app was all about, upon download I IMMEDIATELY REGRETTED doing so. The app has changed the way my phone works!! Changing the layout of the iPhone, refusing to let me unlock or even recognize my face!? I am offended that the president and administration are allowing such an app to be available!! Especially to all ages!? NO!! The context is NOT FAMILY FRIENDLY nor user friendly. I am HORRIFIED this app is available for download and I hope that I can stop anyone else from downloading such a PUTRID and DISGUSTING app!!! Do yourself a favor and DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: no🤏🏻🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: first of all i tried downloading this to support our poor cheese ball and i was greeted with the worst picture of him (not that any of them are great) and it made me THROW UP. i have a fear of throwing up so it must’ve been  very terrifying for even me to throw up. secondly i couldn’t b e l i e v e the disrespect i got when i got the app. it asked me to donate to too which is stupid considering you have so much money. it then asked to send notifications and now i’m being spammed with notifications and it won’t stop. thanks a lot cheese balls. you smell like one too 😊

attributes.title: They ate my chinchilla with chopsticks
attributes.review: OK! THAT IS IT! THIS IS THE FINAL STRAW! I’VE HAD IT WITH ALL YOU FRICKIN’ TROLLS AND ALL YOU FRICKIN’ HATERS AND ALL YOU FRICKIN FAN FRICKS. YOU GUYS ARE THE ONES THAT RUINED THIS SONIC FOR EVERYONE! CANT YOU SEE THAT? WHAT THE FRICK! ARE YOU GUYS DOING! ASKING FOR ALL THIS FRICKING GARBAGE- WHY DO WE NEED SONIC ADVENTURE 3? YOU GUYS KILLED THE SONIC SERIES ALL YOU FRICKIN FAN FRICKS AND YOUR FRICKIN FANTASIES SPEWED OUT AT YOU BY FRICKIN POO MERCHANTS!!! I’M TIRED OF ALL YOU FRICKS! I’M SO FRICKIN MAD! I’M SO FRICKIN MAD- I MEAN, YOU GUYS- YOU GUYS HAVE OFFICIALLY MADE ME LOSE MY MARBLES!  WHY CANT YOU GUYS JUST ASK FOR A 3D ENVIRONMENT CLASSIC SONIC GAME! THIS IS A NIGHTMARE! [THROWS CHAIR] I’M SURE NO SONIC FAN PREDICT- WOULD PREDICT- THAT THE ADVENTURE- THE ADVENTURE FANTASIZES WOULD RUIN EVERYTHING! [BREATHING HEAVILY] AND NOW- AND NOW I BET BY NOW THAT SEGA HAS GOT A FREAKIN SONIC ADVENTURE 3 IN DEVELOPMENT WITH SONIC TEAM BECAUSE YOU FRICKIN FRICKS CAN’T EVER, BE QUENCHED. YOUR FANTASIES CAN’T EVER BE QUENCHED- CAN THEY?

attributes.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: Ladies and gents, lemme just say one thing: DO. NOT, DOWNLOAD. THIS. APP 😡😡!!!!! For starters there was a weird orange dude on the sign in page 🤮🤮. I was extremely creeped out and I felt like I was being watched 😬 It made me want to call my mom 😔. He was demanding my personal information and I felt completely violated 😖😖.  There was some rando thing behind him in the back that made no sense 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️. He kinda seems like a predator and I am now putting a lock on my hamster cage 😳😳. Idk maybe I’m just dramatic but unless you want your eyes to be molested, I would steer clear of this app 🤭.

attributes.title: Do not Download!!
attributes.review: Oh my word! This app is terrible!! I am of course a Trump supporter (vote Trump 2020!) and I just wanted to get all the latest updates on rallies and our president’s campaign. However, once I downloaded the app, my phone shut down!! It wouldn’t turn on no matter what buttons I pressed. I took my phone to my local phone repair shop and they said there was nothing they could do. So, I had to purchase a brand new phone. This app costed me two hundred dollars!!! I am furious! Whatever you do, DO NOT GET THIS APP unless you want a virus in your cell phone. ✨✨
